name: DCH Blood Spot Outcome CHT SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of the screening for congenital hypothyroidism.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined, no history of being screened
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined, screened in UK (as reported by parents) with no evidence of result
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined, screened outside UK with evidence of result
Congenital hypothyroidism screening declined, screened outside UK with no evidence of result
Newborn blood spot screening programme, congenital hypothyroidism repeat screening with further sample required
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, too young for reliable screening
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, sample taken too soon after blood transfusion (less than 72 hours)
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, insufficient sample
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): incorrect blood application
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): compressed/damaged
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: day 0 and day 5 on same card
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: NHS number missing/not accurately recorded
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: date of sample missing/not accurately recorded
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: date of birth not accurately matched
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: expired card used
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: more than 14 days in transit, too old for analysis
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, unsuitable sample: damaged in transit
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, too premature for testing
Congenital hypothyroidism screening, borderline result
Congenital hypothyroidism not suspected
Newborn blood spot screening programme, congenital hypothyroidism not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected congenital hypothyroidism
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete: over 1 year old, too old for screening
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete, moved out of area
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete, not contactable, reasonable efforts made
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete, baby died
Congenital hypothyroidism not screened for or screening incomplete, not required, previous valid result
